query:
ALTER TABLE tmlReadings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tml5 DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tml6 DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tml7 DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tml8 DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS tRequired DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS retirementThickness DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS originalInstallDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS shortTermRate DECIMAL(10,6),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS longTermRate DECIMAL(10,6),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS corrosionRateType ENUM('LT', 'ST', 'USER', 'GOVERNING'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS corrosionRateMpy DECIMAL(10,3),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS remainingLife DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionInterval DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS statusThreshold DECIMAL(4,2) DEFAULT 1.10,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementMethod ENUM('UT', 'RT', 'VISUAL', 'PROFILE', 'OTHER'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicianId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicianName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS equipmentId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calibrationDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dataQualityStatus ENUM('good', 'anomaly', 'growth_error', 'below_minimum', 'confirmed') DEFAULT 'good',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reviewedBy VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reviewDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notes TEXT;
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS longTermRate DECIMAL(10,6),

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS corrosionRateMpy DECIMAL(10,3),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS remainingLife DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionInterval DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS statusThreshold DECIMAL(4,2) DEFAULT 1.10,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS measurementMethod ENUM('UT', 'RT', 'VISUAL', 'PROFILE', 'OTHER'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicianId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS technicianName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS equipmentId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS calibrationDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dataQualityStatus ENUM('good', 'anomaly', 'growth_error', 'below_minimum', 'confirmed') DEFAULT 'good',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reviewedBy VARCHAR(64),

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notes TEXT;
